Name: urbit
Overview: Urbit is a clean-slate OS and network for the 21st century. Self-host your computer, identity and access to the urbit world.

urbitconfigpath.Name: Urbit Config Path
urbitconfigpath.Description: This is where Urbit will access the key or the data pier of an existing planet. A key file sampel-palnet.key will boot the sampel-palnet planet. For booting a comet create a file in .comet.

webinterfaceport.Name: Web Interface Port
webinterfaceport.Description: Port 80 is used for Urbit's HTTP interface for both Landscape and for API calls to the ship.

udpamesport.Name: UDP Ames Port
udpamesport.Description: Port 34343 is set by default to be used by Ames for ship-to-ship communication.
